name: Spider Attack
description: Spider Attack - this is a simple action game with elements of tycoon. In it, you need to defend yourself from hordes of spiders in space. You can build solar panels (Give power), turrets (Shoot at spiders) and you can summon a web cleaner (Removes cobwebs from cannons). Made for Mini Jam 123. That's it! [And yes, I'm very stupid, so I had to make the game in 5 hours, instead of 72 data]
